dmca.title: Google DMCA Complaint HeadsetPlus
dmca.body:
570 El Camino Real STE 150-421
Redwood City, CA 94063
Toll Free 1-877-999-3838
(650) 306-9768 Local (650) 361-0157 Fax

March 8, 2007

HeadsetPlus.com
570 El Camino Real STE 150-421
Redwood City, CA 94063

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, Personalized Homepage DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94063

RE: Infringement/Copyright material Delivered via: USPS and Fax

Dear Sirs:

This letter is intended to announce recently discovered Copyright infringement of the content of our company's website.

1. The copyrighted material in question is the entire content and layout of HeadsetPlus.com's main website and its entire content. The URL is: www.HeadsetPlus.com and all of its content.

2. The following link has an exact copy or replica of our company website attached within the content its website. The "infringing material" is a link with our entire website embedded or attached within the "offending websites" links.
www.LionTravel.com
http://tc2en.mololingo.com.tw/
http://tc2en.moiolingo.com.tw/m2m-0000/headsetplus.com/ <- this is page in question that is copyright infringing or a direct copy of our entire site and its content.

3. Company Contact information:

HeadsetPlus.com
570 El Camino Real STE 150-421
Redwood City, CA 94063
(650) 306.9768
sales@headsetplus.com
tomas@headsetplus.com

4. Infringing Company Information:

Lion Travel Service Company, LTD.
105 Duns in Taipei City turn north road No.170 3rd FLR
(Great Building of Tai world)
Phone: Taichungs 07-213-7794

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Please remove or disable all access to infringing material.
Regards,

Yungi Chu
